text: William Klein (April 19, 1926 - September 10, 2022) was an American-born French photographer and filmmaker. His works were mainly about photojournalism and fashion photography. He was seen as one of the most influential photographers of all time. Klein died on September 10, 2022 in Paris, France at the age of 96.US-born photographer William Klein dies aged 96: family ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American photojournalists Category:American painters Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Artists from New York City
title: William Klein
